h2_title: Green-Capped Martialist Boss Fight and Guide
content: Stay close to his weapon, and when he finally appears to grab it, you can launch into an offensive while he's vulnerable to deal some damage.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Green-Capped_Martialist.md', within the main section titled 'Green-Capped Martialist', specifically from the subsection 'Green-Capped Martialist Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Stay close to his weapon, and when he finally appears to grab it, you can launch into an offensive while he's vulnerable to deal some damage.
